title: Try to cleanup some things in mission navigation mode

conversation.author: RomanBapst

review_comments.author: RomanBapst
review_comments.body: @dagar @MaEtUgR hope I'm not missing anything, but to me this makes no sense. Mission itself just reads from dataman, right?

review_comments.author: dagar
review_comments.body: It makes sense for air in restore to not have to depend on mavlink, but I think at this point we should get rid of it.
